Name: Latest Word
Ingredients: 20 ml Green Chartreuse (or alternative herbal liqueur)
7.5 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lime zest twist.
Express lime zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A Last Word made with genever in place of London dry gin. The distinctive flavour of genever stands up well to the other very characterful ingredients.
Nutrition: One serving of Latest Word contains 167 calories
